title: Supplies
fullText:
An extra-low voltage supply for a connectable electrical installation shall be obtained from one or any combination of the following sources:
(a) Connectable electrical installation battery.
(b) Extra-low voltage d.c. supply via a transformer/rectifier unit complying with AS/NZS 60335.1 and AS/NZS 61558.2.6.
(c) Extra-low voltage d.c. generator that is driven by any form of energy.
(d) Extra-low voltage solar PV power supply system or similar.
